title: Sooooooo yeah...
body:
Hey there, I was in placements for my solo queue 1W 1L, I start a new game and BAM! Bug splat, the game has to repair and take 10 minutes, obviously my team /remake the game. But for me it's counter as a lost in my  promo, I've lost tons of LP because of that and I've also failed my promos.

Is there a way to have this fixed so I regain the LP I've lost?
As much as I'd love to take the blame for a defeat, there's just nothing I could do to prevent a random bug splat, especially since I had played like 10 games prior to that bug splat.

So yeah, does someone know if Riot has ever done anything to fix such events or they just tell us ''Sorry we can't do anything'' a.k.a. ''Go fuck yourself''.

replies.body: That's really frustrating and i've been there before for sure! I can't return your LP, but I can help to make sure you don't lose anymore. Bugsplats are usually a sign something isn't updating correctly to keep the game running smoothly. Thankfully our [Crash Guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974)has a list of steps for you to run through to make sure everything is up to date so that you don't have any more issues or LP loss.

After cooling off, I realize I was rude to you and I apologize, in no way are you at fault for not being able to help as you are only the social media specialist. Again I apologize for letting my anger get the best of me.

My shit is up to date, it was a corrupted game file but thank you for sending me go fuck myself I guess.
Also it's not a fact that you guys can't or not, obviously you can since you guys have access to the source code of the game, it's just that you all prefer doing nothing about it, probably to avoid abuse of it and all that but seriously, who would even do that in promos?
